title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement hello.indraneel@gmail.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Chakraborty (2024). clintrialx: Connect work clinical trials data sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via live APIs. R package version 0.1.0, http://ineelhere.github.io/clintrialx/.

what: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: goal clintrialx fetch clinical trials data freely available registries. Currently, supports ClinicalTrials.gov registry using V2 API.

title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: can install package GitHub :

title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: basic example shows download data based NCT ID(s): Fetch /specific fields: can also download data multiple NCT IDs: Similarly, can query desired fields:
code: library(clintrialx) #> Loading required package: httr #> Loading required package: lubridate #>  #> Attaching package: 'lubridate' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     date, intersect, setdiff, union #> Loading required package: readr #> Loading required package: dplyr #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union #> Loading required package: progress fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165") #> # A tibble: 1 × 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findin… https://cl… <NA>    COMPLETED      "Background:\n… #> # ℹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, … fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165", fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status", "Sponsor")) #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                              `Study Status` Sponsor #>   <chr>        <chr>                                      <chr>          <chr>   #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle … COMPLETED      Nation… fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT02967965", "NCT04000165", "NCT01007279", "NCT02376244", "NCT01179776")) #> [=================>--------------------------] 2/5 ( 40%) Fetching #> NCT04000165[=========================>------------------] 3/5 ( 60%) Fetching #> NCT01007279[==================================>---------] 4/5 ( 80%) Fetching #> NCT02376244[============================================] 5/5 (100%) Fetching #> NCT01179776 #> # A tibble: 5 × 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT02967965  CARdioprotect… https://cl… CARIM   ACTIVE_NOT_RE… "CARIM is a pr… #> 2 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findin… https://cl… <NA>    COMPLETED      "Background:\n… #> 3 NCT01007279  Rosuvastatin … https://cl… ROMA    COMPLETED      "An increase i… #> 4 NCT02376244  The Health Im… https://cl… <NA>    COMPLETED      "Cardiac rehab… #> 5 NCT01179776  Ilomedin Trea… https://cl… <NA>    COMPLETED      "Acute myocard… #> # ℹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, … fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT02967965", "NCT04000165", "NCT01007279", "NCT02376244", "NCT01179776"),                           fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status", "Sponsor")) #> [=================>--------------------------] 2/5 ( 40%) Fetching #> NCT04000165[=========================>------------------] 3/5 ( 60%) Fetching #> NCT01007279[==================================>---------] 4/5 ( 80%) Fetching #> NCT02376244[============================================] 5/5 (100%) Fetching #> NCT01179776 #> # A tibble: 5 × 4 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                              `Study Status` Sponsor #>   <chr>        <chr>                                      <chr>          <chr>   #> 1 NCT02967965  CARdioprotection in Myocardial Infarction  ACTIVE_NOT_RE… EZUS-L… #> 2 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle … COMPLETED      Nation… #> 3 NCT01007279  Rosuvastatin in Preventing Myonecrosis in… COMPLETED      Univer… #> 4 NCT02376244  The Health Impact of High Intensity Exerc… COMPLETED      Liverp… #> 5 NCT01179776  Ilomedin Treatment for Patients Having Un… COMPLETED      Thromb…

what: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
text: Retrieves data one clinical trials ClinicalTrials.gov API based NCT ID(s).

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
text: nct_ids character vector one NCT IDs (e.g., "NCT04000165") clinical trials fetch. fields character vector specifying fields retrieve. NULL (default), available fields fetched. specified, must subset available fields.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
text: tibble containing clinical trial data columns matching requested fields.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
text: function allows specify one NCT IDs optionally select specific fields interest. fetches relevant data returns tibble. function constructs request NCT ID, specifying desired fields. uses progress bar show progress fetching data multiple trials. data returned tibble columns corresponding requested fields. fetches fail API response contains columns requested, warnings issued. Ensure fields parameter contains valid field names specified guide . Invalid fields result error.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
text: following available fields can request ClinicalTrials.gov:   NCT Number,   Study Title,   Study URL,   Acronym,   Study Status,   Brief Summary,   Study Results,   Conditions,   Interventions,   Primary Outcome Measures,   Secondary Outcome Measures,   Outcome Measures,   Sponsor,   Collaborators,   Sex,   Age,   Phases,   Enrollment,   Funder Type,   Study Type,   Study Design,   IDs,   Start Date,   Primary Completion Date,   Completion Date,   First Posted,   Results First Posted,   Last Update Posted,   Locations,   Study Documents

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID — fetch_specific_trial_data
code: # Fetch data for a single NCT ID trial_data <- fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165") trial_data #> # A tibble: 1 × 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findin… https://cl… NA      COMPLETED      "Background:\n… #> # ℹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, …  # Fetch data for multiple NCT IDs multiple_trials <- fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT04000165", "NCT04002440")) multiple_trials #> # A tibble: 2 × 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findin… https://cl… NA      COMPLETED      "Background:\n… #> 2 NCT04002440  Directed Use … https://cl… DREAM-… ACTIVE_NOT_RE… "Among ambulat… #> # ℹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, …  # Fetch data for multiple NCT IDs with specific fields specific_fields <- fetch_specific_trial_data(   c("NCT04000165", "NCT04002440"),   fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status") ) specific_fields #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                                      `Study Status` #>   <chr>        <chr>                                              <chr>          #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle Cell Dis… COMPLETED      #> 2 NCT04002440  Directed Use of REmote Patient Management System … ACTIVE_NOT_RE…

title: Print a Welcome Message — hello
text: function prints welcome message ClinTrialX.

title: Print a Welcome Message — hello
text: character string containing welcome message.

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
text: function sends query ClinicalTrials.gov API returns results tibble. Users can specify various parameters filter results, parameter provided, omitted query.

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
code: query_clinical_trials(   condition = "Glioblastoma",   location = "India",   title = NULL,   intervention = "Drug",   status = NULL,   page_size = 20 )

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
text: condition character string specifying medical condition search . filter results studies related given condition. location character string specifying location (e.g., city country) search . filter results studies conducted specified location. title character string specifying keywords search study title. filter results studies title include specified keywords. intervention character string specifying intervention treatment search . filter results studies involving specified intervention. status character vector specifying overall status studies. Valid values include: ACTIVE_NOT_RECRUITING - Studies actively conducting         recruiting participants. COMPLETED - Studies completed phases. ENROLLING_BY_INVITATION - Studies enrolling participants         invitation . NOT_YET_RECRUITING - Studies yet started recruiting. RECRUITING - Studies actively recruiting participants. SUSPENDED - Studies temporarily halted. TERMINATED - Studies terminated completion. WITHDRAWN - Studies withdrawn enrollment. AVAILABLE - Studies available. NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE - Studies longer available. TEMPORARILY_NOT_AVAILABLE - Studies temporarily available. APPROVED_FOR_MARKETING - Studies approved marketing. WITHHELD - Studies data withheld. UNKNOWN - Studies unknown status. page_size integer specifying number results per page. default value 20. maximum allowed value 1,000. value greater 1,000 specified, coerced 1,000. specified, default value used.

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
text: tibble containing query results. row represents study, columns         correspond study details returned API.

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
text: function can return 1,000 results. function constructs query ClinicalTrials.gov API using provided parameters. supports filtering condition, location, title keywords, intervention, overall status. function handles API response, checks errors, parses results tibble.

title: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API — query_clinical_trials
code: # Query for studies related to "diabetes" in "Kolkata" with the status "RECRUITING" query_clinical_trials(condition = "diabetes", location = "Kolkata",                                  status = "RECRUITING") #> The Query matches 9 trials/data points in the ClinicalTrials.gov records. #> Your query returned 9 trials/data points. #> # A tibble: 9 × 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04596631  A Research St… https://cl… PIONEE… RECRUITING     "This study co… #> 2 NCT06065540  A Research St… https://cl… REIMAG… RECRUITING     "The study wil… #> 3 NCT05929079  A Study of Re… https://cl… TRIUMP… RECRUITING     "The purpose o… #> 4 NCT06221969  A Research St… https://cl… NA      RECRUITING     "This study wi… #> 5 NCT06370715  A Study of LY… https://cl… NA      RECRUITING     "The purpose o… #> 6 NCT05254002  A Study to Le… https://cl… CONFID… RECRUITING     "Finerenone wo… #> 7 NCT05705271  A Study to Le… https://cl… NA      RECRUITING     "Researchers a… #> 8 NCT06269107  A Research St… https://cl… COMBIN… RECRUITING     "This study wi… #> 9 NCT05929066  A Study of Re… https://cl… TRIUMP… RECRUITING     "The purpose o… #> # ℹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <lgl>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <dbl>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <date>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, …   # Query for studies with "vaccine" in the title and the status "COMPLETED" query_clinical_trials(title = "vaccine", status = "COMPLETED", page_size = 50) #> The Query matches 0 trials/data points in the ClinicalTrials.gov records. #> Your query returned 0 trials/data points. #> # A tibble: 0 × 30 #> # ℹ 30 variables: NCT Number <chr>, Study Title <chr>, Study URL <chr>, #> #   Acronym <chr>, Study Status <chr>, Brief Summary <chr>, #> #   Study Results <chr>, Conditions <chr>, Interventions <chr>, #> #   Primary Outcome Measures <chr>, Secondary Outcome Measures <chr>, #> #   Other Outcome Measures <chr>, Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, #> #   Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, Enrollment <chr>, Funder Type <chr>, #> #   Study Type <chr>, Study Design <chr>, Other IDs <chr>, Start Date <chr>, …

title: Get API Version Information — version_info
text: function retrieves version information specified clinical trials API sources.

title: Get API Version Information — version_info
text: source character string specifying source query. Currently, "clinicaltrials.gov" supported.

title: Get API Version Information — version_info
text: Prints API version data timestamp successful. Otherwise, prints error message.

title: Get API Version Information — version_info
code: version_info() #> Clinicaltrials.gov API version: 2.0.3 #> Timestamp: 2024-07-19 11:12:14 version_info("clinicaltrials.gov") #> Clinicaltrials.gov API version: 2.0.3 #> Timestamp: 2024-07-19 11:12:14
